document_data.mainbody:
The Tower of Anhur was a sacred tower located in the capital city of Skuld in Mulhorand during the midâ€“14 century DR.
The Tower was located in the southwest corner of the City of the Gods in the northcentral part of the city. 
As its name implied, the Tower of Anhur was once the home of an incarnation of Anhur who held the title of God-King in Mulhorand. It was constructed by slaves thousands of years ago as of the .
